ai-patthana15.4:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.4:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.4:2.1_0: or causes and reasons to give rise to the teaching.
ai-patthana15.4:3.1_0: for the sake of not grasping ...
ai-patthana15.4:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
